places.name: Mesa Arts Center
places.description: Interactive science museum with hands-on exhibits, including a zero-gravity room and robotics displays.

places.name: Commemorative Air Force Museum
places.description: Historic Italian-style theater offering concerts, plays, and cultural performances in a stunning architectural setting.

places.name: Golfland Sunsplash
places.description: Former power plant turned cultural center with exhibitions, events, and sunset views over Guaíba Lake.

places.name: Mesa Historical Museum
places.description: Popular urban park with jogging paths, playgrounds, and a replica of a Dutch windmill.

places.name: Mesa Market Place Swap Meet
places.cost: Free entry; food and goods vary
places.description: Historic public market with over 100 shops offering local produce, crafts, and traditional cuisine.

places.name: Mesa Temple & Visitors’ Center
places.description: Modern art museum in a striking building by architect Álvaro Siza, featuring works by Iberê Camargo.

places.name: Goldfield Ghost Town
places.address: 4650 N Mammoth Mine Rd, Apache Junction, AZ
places.description: Botanical garden with native and exotic plants, walking trails, and educational exhibits.

places.name: Downtown Mesa
places.address: Around Main St & Macdonald, Mesa, AZ
